actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing testimony of Roxanna Pratt in the case of United States of America v. Chung Yup Yum, a.k.a. Charles S. Yum, Ki Bung Lee, and Sung Kyu Chun, Criminal Action No. 84-47.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a named Senate employee in connection with testimony and the production of subpoenaed documents in the case of United States of America v. Chung Yup Yum, etc., et al. Authorizes such employee to testify and produce documents in such case, except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing testimony of Roxanna Pratt in the case of United States of America v. Chung Yup Yum, a.k.a. Charles S. Yum, Ki Bung Lee, and Sung Kyu Chun, Criminal Action No. 84-47.
